test_cases.description: Verify user can enter source and destination for bus booking.
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusApp:
    
    def test_enter_source_destination(self, app):
        """Verify user can enter source and destination for bus booking."""
        app.enter_source('Mumbai')
        app.enter_destination('Pune')
        assert app.get_source() == 'Mumbai', 'Source should be Mumbai'
        assert app.get_destination() == 'Pune', 'Destination should be Pune'

test_cases.name: test_select_date
test_cases.description: Verify user can select the date for bus booking.
test_cases.code:
```python
import pytest

class TestBusApp:
    
    def test_select_date(self, app):
        """Verify user can select the date for bus booking."""
        app.tap_date_field()
        assert app.is_quick_date_option_visible('TODAY'), 'TODAY option should be visible'
        assert app.is_quick_date_option_visible('TOMORROW'), 'TOMORROW option should be visible'
        app.select_quick_date_option('TODAY')
        today_date = app.get_selected_date()
        assert today_date == app.get_current_date(), 'Selected date should be today'
        app.select_quick_date_option('TOMORROW')
        tomorrow_date = app.get_selected_date()
        assert tomorrow_date == app.get_tomorrow_date(), 'Selected date should be tomorrow'
